pre_install: Set-Content -Value "@echo off`nif `"%1`" == `"h`" goto begin`nmshta vbscript:createobject(`"wscript.shell`").run(`"%~nx0 h`",0)(window.close)&&exit`n:begin`njavaw -D64 --add-exports=java.base/sun.security.action=ALL-UNNAMED --add-exports=java.desktop/com.sun.imageio.plugins.jpeg=ALL-UNNAMED --add-exports=java.desktop/com.sun.imageio.spi=ALL-UNNAMED -jar $((Get-ChildItem josm*.jar)[0].Name)" -Path josm.cmd
